attributes.action: review the way income support and all benefit claims are processed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: im now on the seventh week without money from my income support claim i have a partner and a two and a half year old girl and a three week old little boy to support and protect. do you think anyone should be made to wait this long the whole system is wrong. i was told that i would have to wait and theres nothing they can do! so my family is to go without food etc would you stand for this! this country is a joke your keen to help other countrys out and let them in and screw the system but what about you own people that really need help
